backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and daily entries with access control, storage mixins, and date-sorted compare functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing modified frontend files for a glowing rainbow button update and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, hooks, and views across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with dark mode class applied.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth state, profile setup modal, and dark‑themed layout rendering with Toaster config.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: Static informational About page with cards explaining app features and a back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard rendering multiple charts and workout heatmap using data from React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar view, highlights days with saved entries, and opens day detail or photo comparison views.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Handles camera access, lens preferences, zoom capabilities, and captures photos for entries.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty placeholder file for a compare date picker modal.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component for comparison slots showing a date, relative day offset badge, and a button to open a calendar.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailsInline: Shows a compact inline summary of a day's measurements and workout data with variance indicators compared to today.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a single day’s entry including photos, measurements, and workouts, with navigation and camera integration.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Provides the top-level app layout with navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Displays side‑by‑side photo comparisons across three selectable dates with variance and calendar selection support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a new user profile with name, gender, and unit selections, then saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Profile settings view allowing users to edit and save profile info and log out, using existing profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, identity persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, entries, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables, and adds utility styles for calendar indicators and toast overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements a styled login page with branding, feature highlights, and a button triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Normalizes various camera errors into consistent categories with user-friendly messages.
Provides heuristics to select a standard rear camera lens, handling device lists, constraints, and PWA-specific limitations.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Detects PWA installation state and Android Chrome environment for special handling.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Offers utilities for converting dates to nanoseconds, formatting dates, and computing day variances and offsets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support and persistence logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugin usage for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file storing the project’s current state, including features, requests, metadata, and configuration for ongoing work.
